title: Signing of Memorandum of Understanding between Ceylon Electricity Board and the China Machinery Engineering Corporation of China to Provide Technical Cooperation of the Stable and Efficient Functioning of the Norochcholai Coal Power Project of 3x300 MW
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. (Mrs.) Pavithra Wanniarachchi, Minister of Power and Energy, to proceed with the activities pertaining to the signing of the above Memorandum of Understanding between the two Institutes, was approved by the Cabinet.
